#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    int T,E,P,len;
    string a;
    
    scanf("%d",&T);
    
    while(T--)
    {
      cin >> a;
      E = P = len = 0;
      len = a.length();
      for(int i=0;i<len;i++)
        {
          if(a[i] == 'E')
            E++;
          else
            P++;
        }
      if(E == P)
        printf("%d 0\n",E); //P
      else if(P > E)
        printf("%d %d\n",E,P-E); //P%E
      else if(P < E)
        printf("%d %d\n",P,E-P); //E%P
      }
      
      return 0;
      //system("pause");
      }
